summary: The video provides a tour of a dog-friendly room at Estelle Manor, showcasing various amenities and facilities. The narrator highlights the presence of a large stables room, a foyer with dog supplies like poo bags and treats, and a birthday gift of macarons. The room includes a mini-bar stocked with drinks and snacks (noting that they incur extra charges), a skincare section (currently empty), and a well-equipped bathroom with items like a sewing kit, intimacy kit, condoms, shower kit, dental kit, shaving kit, and sanitary kit. The bedroom features a TV and wardrobe space. The narrator mentions the cost of the room, noting that the standard stable room is £650 per night, while the upgraded large stable room costs £750 per night. They express curiosity about the pricing of rooms without a dog.
keywords: Estelle Manor, dog-friendly room, stables room, poo bags, dog treats, birthday macarons, mini-bar, snacks, skincare, bathroom, sewing kit, intimacy kit, condoms, shower kit, dental kit, shaving kit, sanitary kit, bedroom, TV, wardrobe, £650, £750, room pricing, dog accommodation
